toggle_long_press_to_reorder_widgets: Yambitsani/Letsani kusindikiza kwakutali kuti mukonzenso ma widget

$ai_chat.intro: Moni! Ine ndine katswiri wa zamaganizo wa m'dera lanu. Kodi ndingakuthandizeni bwanji?
$ai_chat.download_title: Tsitsani fayilo ya LLM yomwe mukufuna:
$ai_chat.teaser_description: Gwiritsani ntchito mphamvu ya Generative AI pa hardware yanu. Chezani, lembani ma code, kapena pangani makina odziyimira pawokha pogwiritsa ntchito chitetezo cha makina am'deralo komanso achinsinsi.
$ai_chat.loading_model: Kuyika chitsanzo mu memori... Izi zingatenge mphindi zingapo.
